column1: The handyman was supposed to arrive at twelve noon, but got stuck in a traffic jam for a few hours.
column2: 这个工人本来应该在中午十二点到达, 但他被交通堵塞困住了几个小时。

column1: My parents usually speak to each other in French, even though my mother is a native English speaker.
column2: 我父母通常用法语对话，即使我母亲的母语是英语。

column1: The large crowd roared in approval as Mark Knopfler played the first few bars of "Money for Nothing".
column2: 就像马克·诺弗勒早期演唱的歌曲《金钱无用》一样，绝大多数的人依然高呼赞成“金钱无用论”。

column1: Tom's daughter pretended not to know him when he came to pick her up from school in his battered old car.
column2: 当汤姆开着他破旧的雷泽车来接女儿放学时，他的女儿假装不认识他。

column1: The Japanese Parliament today officially elected Ryoutarou Hashimoto as the country's 52nd prime minister.
column2: 日本国会今天正式选举了桥本龙太郎作为全国第52届总理。

column1: Last year in the Philippines, earthquakes and tidal waves resulted in the deaths of more than 6,000 people.
column2: 去年在菲律宾，地震和海啸造成了超过6000人的死亡。

column1: My mother speaks French better than my father speaks English, so they usually speak to each other in French.
column2: 我母亲的法语比我父亲的英语要好，所以他们通常用法语交流。

column1: Tom didn't know how to translate the word "computer" because the people he was talking to had never seen one.
column2: 汤姆不知如何翻译“计算机”一词，因为同他谈话的人从未见过一台。

column1: Even now, I occasionally think I'd like to see you. Not the you that you are today, but the you I remember from the past.
column2: 即使是现在，我偶尔还是想见到你。不是今天的你，而是我记忆中曾经的你。

column1: If a person has not had a chance to acquire his target language by the time he's an adult, he's unlikely to be able to reach native speaker level in that language.
column2: 如果一个人在成人前没有机会习得目标语言，他对该语言的认识达到母语者程度的机会是相当小的。
